start.text: Just watch out for friendly fire. If my toilet is any indication, I don't have the best aim.
Fuck yeah! Kill those sons of bitches!

start_boss.text: We're the 'fuck you' the world forgot.
Shit's getting hairier than a gorilla in a bear suit. Let's do our best not to rattle the cages.
Remember to keep a clear head, a steady hand, and a flaccid penis.

out_of_missiles.text: Shit, I'm running low on missiles. If you gave me a dollar for every one I got, I'd have twenty-five cents.

engaged.text: You want some of this? Huh?
Oh yeah, come to papa, you ugly little cunt!
I've got some bullets here with your name on 'em! And they're gonna write my name in your chest!
Ha! You're gonna need a stimpak for that wound!
Eat lead you ugly son of a bitch!
I don't want to set the woooooorld on fire! I just want to start a flame in your heart!
Lick my tube steak you piece of shit!

hull_90.text: I think my balls just went on strike.

hull_50.text: That odd-shaped pipe's probably nothing... but if it is something, let the record show that I'm a terrible fucking mechanic.

hull_30.text: Agh! You wouldn't shoot a man with glasses, would you?!?

overload.text: Oh, this? This happens. It's called the Vincent effect. Named after the famous scientist, what's his name, Jean-Bapt-Penis or something.
Holy fucking shit. This is what they call a 'white knuckle' moment. Well, I don't know if my knuckles are white but I know my undies ain't.

victory.text: Looks like we hit 'em where it hurts. Right in the dick.
Looks like that's the last of 'em.
Is it wrong to hurt people? I really don't give a fuck.
The rape train has no brakes.
Fighting with you really gets the blood pumping. Been a long time since my heart felt anything besides chems and cholesterol.
Just another day in the sector.
Fish in a... whatya call it... barrel.
That fight went as smooth as apple butter.
That, my friend, is how you bring the pain.
